name: Turbo Snake
description:
Classic game we all love on steroids!

Collect the food, dodge the enemies and gain crazy powerups!

How long can you survive?

Features:

  • Wide variety of enemies
  • Multiple powerups
  • Multiple difficulty modes
  • Global Leaderboards*
  • Score sharing*

*Android and iOS versions only

Controls:

Move - Arrow Keys / WASD / Controller

Note: Currently UI has to be selected with a mouse. Keyboard and controller UI support is coming soon.
